data.name: Sekuritance
data.description:
Launched in Ireland at the beginning of 2021 by a team based in Ireland, London and Malta is a RegTech and Risktech platform designed to help launchpads, projects, new tokens startups, exchange, crypto payment gateways, online merchants and individuals a set of tools and services to minimise fraud and money laundering in the industry, protect their business and transact securely.

SKRT is the native utility token that is used for:

* Fees for processing transactions and storing data.
* Running governance scoring on the various screening
* earning tokens upon each successful individual screening and participation and more

SKRT tools include: 

* Sekur.Vault - data tokenisation vault
* Sekur.MFA - a multi-factor authentication toolkit including 3D Secure for card payments
* Sekur.Alert - our fraud/scam report and reward solutions
* Sekur.Transact - KYC, KYB, KYT, AML, Sanction Screening, rule engine applications ALL under the Sekuritance roof 
* Sekur.Trace - Crypto Transaction and Address analysis and scoring solution
* Sekur.Certify - Blockchain Wallet Verification service allows for a user to claim controlling power certification on a particular wallet once a number of actions would have been performed, KYC & AML checks confirmed and crypto investigation on the wallet completed. 

### Who Are the Founders of Sekuritance & the SKRT utility?

The Sekuritance Network and Ecosystem as well as its underlying SKRT utility are the the brainchild of Fintech experts and developers Jonathan Camilleri Bowman and Jan Gatt, both of whom have extensive experience in Fintech, RegTech and RiskTech, their solution architecture and deliverables.

This project has already teamed up with numerous providers, partners and end user customers and employs more than 20 staff, including developers with experience at multi-national Fintech companies.

### Where Can I Buy the SKRT utility?

SKRT is available for purchase on a growing number of exchanges, with cryptocurrency and [stablecoin](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-a-stablecoin) pairs currently available.

Uniswap v2: https://v2.info.uniswap.org/token/0x887168120cb89fb06f3e74dc4af20d67df0977f6
Gate.IO: https://www.gate.io/trade/SKRT_USDT
Balancer: https://pools.balancer.exchange/#/pool/0x36399db5c96c5e769ad0c86e18a40628f7a6a323/
